## Methods

### `present(message: string, type?: ToastType, duration?: number) => Promise<any>`

| ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `type`     | `"info" \| "error" \| "default" \| "success" \| "warning"` |             |
| `duration` | `number`                                                   |             |
